array.string: The default score multiplier is 10x. This means that sinking a ship with a base score of 500 will yield 5000 points. Your score multiplier will increase by completing objectives and ranking up.

Cannonballs on deck represent your accuracy bonus. Shooting a ship will add a cannonball, and missing will remove one. When you have 3 cannonballs on deck, you will receive 15% more score from all sources.
Your cannon shots can ricochet to nearby ships that are within the cannonball's ricochet cone. This enables you to sink up to 6 ships with a single shot.

Each time you sink a rival pirate ship, you capture the ship's captain. Press B to feed them to the sharks for extra score. There's only room in the brig for 6 prisoners, so be sure to feed the sharks regularly!
Molten Shot: Shoots two extra cannonballs.
Venom Shot: Spawns pools of acid.
Crimson Shot: Knocks enemy crew overboard.
Brandy Slick: Burns ships when ignited.
Powder Kegs: Explosive barrels in the water.
Trawling Net: Slows ships within its radius.
Navy Colors: Stops enemies from firing at you.
Hand of Davy: Drags ships underwater.
Tornado Storm: Destroys ships in its path.
Ghost Ship: While under the effect of this^spell, you cannot be hit or get a red cross.
Whirlpool: Swallows ships in its vortex.
Sea of Lava: Turns the ocean to lava and^spawns pools of magma.
